name: LastFrontierHero
description:
In the middle of a war between 2 kingdoms for control of an area rich in magical resources. Where physical weapons aren't enough, your cunning and skills can put an end to this bloodbath.

You have been sent to end a conflict that lasts years, a simple mission, to eliminate the chief of the enemy army.

GAME FEATURES

- Tower Defense + Roguelike + Aventure
- More than 10 skill trees
- Exponential Progression Character
- Artificial intelligence that adapts to your level and skills
- More than 20 quests and unique secrets
- Unique weapons and armor
- Improve and customize your character without limits

THE GAME CONTINUES IN BETA VERSION

More content will be added every week, our development team is open to any ideas to improve our game. and will be asked regularly.
